statements: SELECT * FROM AgriculturalData
SELECT id, temperature FROM AgriculturalData WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT sensor_id, humidity FROM AgriculturalData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalData WHERE soil_moisture < 30 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM AgriculturalData WHERE humidity < 40 AND temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp, MAX(humidity) as max_humidity FROM AgriculturalData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_humidity > 60 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, soil_moisture FROM AgriculturalData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND soil_moisture < 40 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalData WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 70 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM AgriculturalData ORDER BY humidity DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM crop_data;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM crop_data WHERE sensor_id = '77b89aa8-8558-426e-b786-e5a10d761696';
SELECT * FROM crop_analysis WHERE crop_type = 'Tomato' AND growth_stage = 'Flowering';
SELECT id, temperature, soil_moisture FROM crop_data WHERE humidity > 60;
SELECT analysis_id, crop_type, pest_status FROM crop_analysis WHERE yield_estimation < 1000;
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, soil_moisture FROM crop_data WHERE soil_moisture BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT analysis_id, crop_type, yield_estimation FROM crop_analysis WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering';
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE sensor_id = 'a52f1519-cf52-4bfa-9bf3-274d07e5a4ea' AND (temperature > 20 OR humidity > 60) ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, crop_type, pest_status FROM crop_analysis WHERE crop_type LIKE 'p%' AND pest_status != 'none';
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_id = 1;
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers WHERE farm_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_crops FROM CropReports GROUP BY farmer_id HAVING num_crops > 2;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, crop_name, yield FROM Farmers INNER JOIN CropReports ON Farmers.farmer_id = CropReports.farmer_id;
SELECT farmer_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM Farmers INNER JOIN SensorData ON Farmers.farmer_id = SensorData.farmer_id WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT farm_location FROM Farmers ORDER BY farm_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crops WHERE harvest_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT crop_name, weight FROM Crops JOIN Yield ON Crops.crop_id = Yield.crop_id ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, installation_date FROM Sensors;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM Crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM Data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, Sensors.sensor_type, Data.timestamp, Data.temperature, Data.humidity FROM Sensors JOIN Data ON Sensors.sensor_id = Data.sensor_id;
SELECT Crops.crop_name, Yield.weight, Yield.timestamp FROM Crops JOIN Yield ON Crops.crop_id = Yield.crop_id WHERE Yield.weight > 100 ORDER BY Yield.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, location FROM fields WHERE field_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit';
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM measurements GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;

SELECT measurements.measurement_id, sensors.sensor_name, measurements.measurement_value FROM sensors JOIN measurements ON sensors.sensor_id = measurements.sensor_id WHERE measurements.measurement_value > 50;
SELECT fields.field_name, crops.crop_name, crop_data.yield FROM fields JOIN crop_data ON fields.field_id = crop_data.field_id JOIN crops ON crop_data.crop_id = crops.crop_id;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(measurement_value) AS avg_measurement_value FROM measurements GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY avg_measurement_value DESC;
